item.title: Maggie Q on Chasing a Woman-Hating Serial Killer in ‘Ballard,’ That Cliffhanger and the Scene That Made Her Say ‘I’m Going to Lose It!’
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: This interview contains major spoilers from the first season of “Ballard,” now streaming on Prime Video. Over the course of her near-three-decade career, Maggie Q has become synonymous
